question: There are 167 fourth-graders at Sunny Hill School. 62 of them are girls. On Thursday, 8 fourth-grade girls and 6 fourth-grade boys were absent. How many fourth grade boys were at Sunny Hill School on Thursday?
answer:
Of the 167 fourth graders, 62 are girls, so 167 students - 62 girls = <<167-62=105>>105 boys.
On Thursday there were 105 boys - 6 absent = <<105-6=99>>99 boys.
#### 99
